content: p 1 tan i s by tanis lavallée it s cowl season people this design features a really 2011 candygramclever 4 rocund repeoat wworked lin 2 high contrast colourways resulting in a totally reversible cowl the key is the slipped stitches no stranded knitting required it s so easy you ll need about 200 yds each of 2 colourways of worsted weight yarn - shown here in tfa orange label in natural colour a and pink grapefruit colour b i used a 16 4 5mm needle the finished cowl measures 22 in circumference and 14 tall meant to be worn folded over slightly like in the pattern shots instructions cast on 148 stitches place marker and join for knitting in the round being careful not to twist rounds 1 & 4 with colour a p1 k1 to end of round rounds 2 & 3 with colour b slip 1 wyif k1 p1 k1 to end of round repeat these 4 rounds until you run out of yarn achieve your desired length or are just done bind off in ribbing enjoy © tanis fiber arts 2017 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only www tanisfiberarts com
